mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_room WHERE (user_id = #{userId} AND target_id = #{targetId}) OR (user_id = #{targetId} AND target_id = #{userId}) LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (user_id, target_id, last_msg, last_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{targetId}, '', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, CASE WHEN r.user_id = #{userId} THEN r.target_id ELSE r.user_id END AS targetName, TO_CHAR(r.last_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') as lastDate FROM chat_room r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} OR r.target_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.last_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_msg (room_id, sender_id, content, reg_date) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT msg_id, room_id, sender_id, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as regDate FROM chat_msg WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY msg_id ASC
